author: timbeiko
content:
Re: the CFI discussion. **Would any client team be opposed to holding off from adding new CFI EIPs until we're at least deploying The Merge on existing testnets?** It does seem to take some time on the calls and set the expectation to the community that now is the time to come and advocate for EIPs, while we don't have a ton of bandwidth to consider them, and haven't begun implementing the existing CFI EIPs (nor have we finished implementing all the merge fixes ðŸ˜…). 

In order to not take up 5-10 minutes on the next ACD to discuss this, if we get all client teams to react to this message with their logo, I will consider that we want to hold off further CFI discussions until after merge testnets are well underway. No worries if we'd rather have the conversation on the next ACD!
